/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architectural styles ranging from modern to traditional, reflecting the city's rich history and its march towards the future. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. Bicycles are parked along the street, hinting at the preferred mode of transportation in this part of the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings.
